resources.string:
"StopWatch: 
 - Click start to start the count process. 
 - hit stop to stop at any time 
 - the lap button will display text for the time you hit it when you press the button. 
 - NOTE: maximum amount of laps is 5 for now 
 
 Timer: 
 - click the up and down arrows to navigate to the time settings you want 
 - the timer will then count down to 0 and a desired alarm will sound/flash. "
